body: representation-change.cc: RepresentationChanger::InsertCheckedFloat64ToInt32, InsertChangeTaggedToFloat64, InsertChangeFloat64ToInt32, Float64OperatorFor(NumberFloor/NumberRound/NumberTrunc). Key functions and definitions: RepresentationChanger::InsertCheckedFloat64ToInt32 (line ~1400), InsertChangeTaggedToFloat64 (line ~1360), InsertChangeFloat64ToInt32 (line ~1320), const Operator* RepresentationChanger::Float64OperatorFor(IrOpcode::Value opcode) (line ~1700). These map simplified ops to machine float64 operators including Float64RoundDown/Truncate/Up.
explanation: Anchors for representation change helpers that insert/check float64->int32 and tagged->float64 conversions and map NumberFloor/Round/Trunc to machine Float64 operators. Critical for minus-zero handling because CheckedFloat64ToInt32 receives a CheckForMinusZeroMode.
